contactName.label: What is your full name?
contactName.length: Enter your full name using 500 characters or less.
contactName.change: Change the full name of the person filling in this application

contactNino.label: What is your National Insurance number?
contactNino.hint: It’s on your National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60. For example, ‘QQ 12 34 56 C’.
contactNino.format: Enter your National Insurance number in the correct format.
contactNino.change: Change the National Insurance number of the person filling in this application

contactID.label: What is your corporate ID?
contactID.length: Enter your corporate ID using 500 characters or less.
